meanings.sent1: The smile on her face was truly gratifying.
meanings.sent2: The sunset was a gratifying sight to behold.
meanings.sent3: It was gratifying to see the puppy chase its tail in circles.
meanings.sent4: The feeling of accomplishment after finishing a puzzle is truly gratifying.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the warm, homemade pie was incredibly gratifying.

meanings.definition: To give pleasure or satisfaction to; satisfy
meanings.sent1: She found it gratifying to help her friend with the project.
meanings.sent2: The delicious meal gratified his hunger after a long day.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick gratified the audience's curiosity.
meanings.sent4: The rain gratified the thirsty plants in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The kind words from her mentor gratified her deeply.
